text: Just What I Am is a song by musicians King Chip and Kid Cudi. A music video goes with the song. The US Hot Rap Songs (Billboard) named it 13 on there list. Just What I Am made platinum status by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). ==In other media== In 2020, the song was heavily featured in the Judd Apatow film The King of Staten Island. ==Charts== Chart (2012) Peak position scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" == Certifications == ==Release history== Country Date Format Label United States October 2, 2012 Digital download Universal Republic United States October 30, 2012 Rhythm/Crossover Radio Universal Republic ==References== Category:2012 songs
title: Just What I Am
